texts: Our team has created a unique diary-analysis algorithm that helps you better understand your thoughts and emotions. It is trained on open data and materials based on cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT).
Below are a few tips to help improve the quality of the analysis of your entries:
Describe not only events, but also your emotions and thoughts about what happened. Remember: the more specific and detailed your entry is, the more helpful the analysis will be.
Try to focus on one specific situation or thought. If several important things happened during the day, it‚Äôs better to create a separate entry for each one.
The algorithm helps identify irrational and unhelpful beliefs, but don‚Äôt hesitate to note positive moments too ‚Äî they are just as important for balance and growth.

Our team has developed a unique journal-analysis algorithm that helps you better understand your thoughts and reactions. The model is trained on open data and materials based on cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT).

You can describe a situation that is bothering you or simply share your thoughts in free form. The algorithm will process your text and highlight insights that can help you better understand yourself and what‚Äôs going on inside.
Tap the button below to see an example of the analysis.
I feel as if people around me see me as a failure. Today at work I made a mistake, and my manager asked me to fix it. His tone felt cold and judgmental, as if he really thinks I‚Äôm a failure.
Our team has created a unique algorithm that analyzes your entries. The AI looks at your situation from different angles and offers helpful CBT-based recommendations.
Describe not only what happened, but also your emotions and thoughts in detail. Remember: the clearer your entry is, the more accurate and useful the analysis will be.
Try to focus on one specific situation or thought at a time. If several important things happened during the day, it‚Äôs better to create separate entries so you can analyze each one individually.
Sometimes standard CBT tools are not enough, and in those moments it can be helpful to draw on ideas from other psychological approaches as well.
Dream analysis can gently tap into deeper experiences and beliefs that are not always easy to notice in everyday life.

Our AI model will analyse your dream using classic principles of interpretation and suggest hypotheses that can help you better understand your inner processes and support your work with cognitive and CBT-based techniques.

mockGpt.consolation: Sometimes we give other people‚Äôs words and reactions more weight than they really deserve. Mistakes at work happen to everyone and do not define our worth as professionals or as human beings. You have achievements, strengths and experience that speak for your competence and personal value.
solutions: Try to separate a constructive comment about your work from a judgment of you as a person. It may be that your manager simply pointed out something that needed to be corrected in the task ‚Äî and that is a natural part of the work process.
Remind yourself of your past successes and situations where you handled tasks well. This helps you see the situation in perspective and not draw conclusions about yourself based on a single episode.
Focus on strengthening your self-esteem. The more confident you feel, the easier it is to receive work-related feedback without experiencing it as personal criticism.
mockGpt.distortion: Chosen because it turns a single incident (a mistake at work) into a sweeping judgment about yourself (‚Äúeveryone thinks I‚Äôm a failure‚Äù).
mockGpt.negativeThought: It feels like everyone around me thinks I‚Äôm a failure.
mockGpt.adaptiveResponse: One mistake does not define me as a professional or as a person. I can learn from this situation and rely on my skills and past successes.

mockGptDream.common: A dream like this can reflect an inner journey through fears, intense feelings and unspoken wishes. The castle, the stormy sea and the destruction may symbolise a sense of instability and deep emotional changes. Such a storyline is often linked to the psyche‚Äôs attempt to understand inner conflicts and move toward self-exploration.
symbols: üè∞ Castle: A symbol of safety, autonomy and boundaries. It may reflect your need for protection and your own inner space.
üåä Stormy sea: An image of strong emotions, inner turbulence and change.
üîÆ Massive mirror: A symbol of self-knowledge, contact with your true self and deep inner reflection.
transfer: üßë‚Äçüíº The changing image of yourself in the mirror may point to a search for an authentic identity and a desire to understand your inner qualities better.
üè∞ The castle can symbolise protection and personal boundaries, while its destruction may represent fear of losing them or important changes that feel tense and unsettling.
üåä The intensifying sea storm may mirror growing emotions and worries, as well as fear of facing something that feels hard to control.
mockGptDream.desires: A wish to better understand your deeper emotions and to find inner clarity and stability.
mockGptDream.fears: Fear of change and uncertainty, worries about losing control and stability.
mockGptDream.middle: I want to feel stable and safe in my life.
mockGptDream.deep: Sometimes I‚Äôm afraid that strong emotions might get out of control, so I want to be prepared for changes and strengthen my inner foundation.
mockGptDream.conclusion: This dream may reflect inner processes linked to the search for stability, self-understanding and adaptation to change. Your psyche is trying to process what you‚Äôre going through and integrate new inner insights.

texts: Exchange ideas and receive kind support from other users.

Tell your story, suggest a topic for reflection, or share what‚Äôs on your heart and mind right now. Your experience may support someone in a difficult moment or simply give them a sense of connection.
All posts are anonymous. If you wish, you can always hide or delete them.
